meanings.definition: Having a forked or branched shape
meanings.sent1: The tree had pronged branches reaching out in all directions.
meanings.sent2: The pronged antlers of the deer were impressive.
meanings.sent3: The pronged shadows of the fence looked like giant fingers on the ground.
meanings.sent4: The lightning split the sky with its pronged bolts.
meanings.sent5: The pronged silhouette of the mountain against the sunset was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Having a pointed or projecting part
meanings.sent1: She carefully avoided the pronged thorns on the rose bush.
meanings.sent2: The pronged tip of the spear gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The pronged edges of the star-shaped cookie cutter made perfect shapes.
meanings.sent4: His pronged finger pointed directly at the map's destination.
meanings.sent5: The pronged end of the key fit perfectly into the lock.

meanings.sent1: The pronged fork was perfect for serving salad.
meanings.sent2: The pronged rake made it easy to gather leaves in the yard.
meanings.sent3: The pronged wire fence kept the cows from wandering into the garden.
meanings.sent4: The pronged comb untangled the knots in her hair effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: The pronged design of the tool allowed for precise carving.
